author: Orion Henry <orion@inkandswitch.com>
name: automerge-backend-wasm
description: wasm-bindgen bindings to the automerge-backend rust implementation

scripts.build: rimraf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-name index
scripts.build-release: rimraf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-name index --release
scripts.release: rimraf pkg && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-name index --release
